participant_1.background:
I work hard and save money for my future.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.
i wish i could live in a fantasy world.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.

participant_2.background:
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
I went hiking and swimming last time I was on vacation.
i graduated with a business degree , and marketing is all that i really enjoyed.
i do not like acting.
I am a female in my early 20s.

content.text: Hi, I'm good. I'm just looking for some friends to talk to.
Oh, cool. What are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I especially like nature documentaries.
That's cool. I like nature documentaries too. I think they're a great way to learn about the world.
Me too. I love learning about new animals and plants.
I think my favorite animal is the panda. They're so cute and cuddly.
I like pandas too. They're really interesting animals.
Yeah, they are. I'm glad you like them too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking and swimming. I also like to go camping.
That sounds fun. I like to go hiking too. I haven't been camping in a while, though.
You should go camping again sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
